title: Statue of Liberty – New York, USA

sections.heading: The Symbol of Freedom
paragraphs: The Statue of Liberty is one of the most recognized monuments in the world. A gift from France in 1886, it represents freedom, hope, and new beginnings.
A visit to Liberty Island offers both historical insight and stunning skyline views.

sections.heading: Things to Do
list: Take a ferry to Liberty Island
Visit the Statue of Liberty Museum
Climb up to the pedestal or crown (with reservation)

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: Book crown tickets months in advance. Ferries can be windy—bring a light jacket.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Check out Battery Park, One World Trade Center, and the 9/11 Memorial.
